text: Rail or rails may refer to: * Railway track * The hot rolled steel profiles used on rail tracks or tramway tracks ** Railway rail ** Vignoles rail ** Flanged T rail ** Grooved rail ** Barlow rail * Rail transport * Rallidae, the group of birds called rails * A guard rail for safety or support * Handrail on a stairway * Rail (band), an American band * Batten (theater), rail in theatrical lighting * Power supply rail, a voltage rail. A single voltage provided by a power supply unit *Common rail, a fuel injection system * R4!L or Rail: English/American disc jockey and producer * A third rail used to provide electricity to a trains locomotive Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Rail
